# Kinga Łoboda

| birth_place    = Gdańsk, Poland

| height         = 1.72 m
| classes        = 49erFX, ILCA 6
}}
Kinga Łoboda (born 11 June 1996) is a Polish sailor. She and Aleksandra Melzacka competed for Poland at the 2020 Summer Olympics in the 49er FX event.
